Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Core

Custom implementations that improve the visualization of the application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FilterCateg_ExpandableListAdapter Expandable list of categories to be used in Filters Activity
Issues_ListAdapter List of issues adapter.
Preference_About Custom preference to add in Setup view so as to have a button which leads to a new activity with information about the app and the authors
Preference_AccountOperations Custom preference item in setup menu for management of IMC account (remind, login, logout)
Preference_Email Create a custom preference in Setup with the role of a button that leads to a new activity, that is sending a mail with an outside application, e.g. gmail.
Preference_PlainText In setup include a preference outlining the version of the application
Preference_Reset Create a custom preference in Setup with the role of a button that clears all data in SQLite
Preference_SeekBar Implement a horizontal SeekBar for Setup->Setting range
SpinnerAdapter_NewIssueCateg This is the adapter for the spinner in Activity_NewIssueA.
 

Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Core Description

Custom implementations that improve the visualization of the application.
